fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
•    Capital Markets Union 
•    Corporate Governance & Company Law 
•    Listing Requirements 
•    Corporate Reporting 
•    Securities Law 
•    Investment Chain and Markets’ Infrastructure 
•    Financial Transaction Tax 
•    Public Country-by-Country Reporting
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: EuropeanIssuers does not belong to any association / federation / confederation or any other type of network. Various national associations representing companies are our members (see the list on our website).
relevant_communication:
- Since 2013: Jointly organised with FESE and the support of DG Grow: EU Small and Mid Cap Awards Ceremony in November / December 
- IPO Task Force (jointly set up with Invest Europe & FESE) with a report published in 2015 
- Conferences, workshops & other events on topics of interest  
- various position papers on policy topics followed 
For more information, see our website: http://www.europeanissuers.eu/position-papers
legal_status: aisbl-ivzw (association internationale sans but lucratif) under belgian law
goals__remit: EuropeanIssuers is a pan-European organisation representing the interests of publicly quoted companies across Europe to the EU Institutions. Our members include both national associations and companies from all sectors in 15 European countries, covering markets worth € 7.6 trillion market capitalisation with approximately 8000 companies. We aim to ensure that EU policy creates an environment in which companies can raise capital through the public markets and can deliver growth over the longer-term. We seek capital markets that serve the interests of their end users, including issuers.
